video.title: Alias
video.synopsis: Jennifer Garner redefined armed and dangerous in this spy series as a double agent CIA operative on a mission to destroy a global crime syndicate.

episodes.synopsis: Grad student by day, spy by night, Sydney Bristow's happiness over her new engagement is short lived as she learns the truth about who she works for.
episodes.title: Truth Be Told

episodes.synopsis: In her new role as a double agent for the CIA, Sydney is intent upon destroying SD-6 within weeks.
episodes.title: So It Begins..

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Dixon go to Madrid to steal a lockbox containing a sketch with what appears to be digital code drawn by a 15th century seer, Milo Rambaldi.
episodes.title: Parity

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Anna memorize a code written by Rambaldi. Sydney and Dixon are sent to investigate a plot to eliminate the United Commerce Organization.
episodes.title: A Broken Heart

episodes.synopsis: Will tells Francie that he's been investigating the death of Danny. Sydney learns from Vaughn that her father may also be working for the FBI.
episodes.title: Doppelganger

episodes.synopsis: Sydney forms the opinion that Jack's suspicious activities led to the death of her mother 20 years earlier, creating a deeper tension between them.
episodes.title: Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: Sydney learns about the Shepard's involvment in her past. Sloane confronts the Alliance about the CIA bug, and they conclude that SD-6 has been moled.
episodes.title: Color-Blind

episodes.synopsis: Sydney travels to Oxford to steal an ancient clock connected to the Rambaldi mystery.
episodes.title: Time will Tell

episodes.synopsis: Sydney is scared, as she thinks that Dixon may have heard her talking to the CIA.
episodes.title: Mea Culpa

episodes.synopsis: Jack must save Sydney when Sloane orders her to be tortured and killed after she is suspected as the mole. Sydney tells Vaughn about her time at SD-6.
episodes.title: Spirit

episodes.synopsis: After Jack saves Sydney during a mission, she discovers that he was resposible for the deaths of many CIA agents, complicating her feelings for him.
episodes.title: The Confession

episodes.synopsis: A group of heavily-armed intruders sneak into SD-6 and take control of the building.
episodes.title: The Box: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Sydney discovers a note left for her by her father, explaining the dire predicament: opening the SD-6 vault would trigger a fatal explosion.
episodes.title: The Box: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Dixon travel to Las Vegas to try and track down the group that nearly destroyed SD-6.
episodes.title: The Coup

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Dixon are dispatched to Tunisia. A Rambaldi manuscript is being held on a yacht, and their mission is to retrieve it before Sark gets it.
episodes.title: Page 47

episodes.synopsis: The Department of Special Research inquires about Sydney's connection to the Rambaldi notebook.
episodes.title: The Prophecy

episodes.synopsis: While being questioned by the FBI about her ties to Rambaldi, Sydney makes a shocking discovery that may unravel the mysterious 500-year-old prophecy.
episodes.title: Q and A

episodes.synopsis: Sydney is reunited with Noah Hicks, an SD-6 agent she dated five years ago.
episodes.title: Masquerade

episodes.synopsis: Vaughn confirms that K-Directorate has hired an assassin, known as "The Snowman" for his favored use of an ice-pick as a weapon, to take out Khasinau.
episodes.title: Snowman

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Vaughn meet with Mr. Sark hoping to catch Khasinau, but Sydney's cover is endangered when a SD-6 agent is sent to stop the trade.
episodes.title: The Solution

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Dixon must go to a Paris nightclub, where Sark will deliver the ampule to Khasinau. Dixon is to steal pages of a Rambaldi manuscript.
episodes.title: Rendezvous

episodes.synopsis: Vaughn and Sydney must destroy a Rambaldi artifact to save Will. Jack makes a deal with Mr. Sark, and The Alliance decides the fate of Emily Sloane.
episodes.title: Almost Thirty Years

episodes.synopsis: "Sydney finds herself face-to-face with her mother, Irina Derevko.
episodes.title: The Enemy Walks In

episodes.synopsis: Sydney begins to question whether her mother is trying to help her or trying to get her killed.
episodes.title: Trust Me

episodes.synopsis: Sydney must stay one step ahead of Sark in retrieving a crucial piece of intel and Jack must face Sydney's mother while Will meets Vaughn.
episodes.title: Cipher

episodes.synopsis: Sydney must stay one step ahead of Sark in retrieving a crucial piece of intel and Jack must face Sydney's mother while Will meets Vaughn.
episodes.title: Dead Drop

episodes.synopsis: Sydney uncovers a chilling secret while on a case, and Vaughn suspects Jack of setting up Sydneys mother to take a fall.
episodes.title: The Indicator

episodes.synopsis: Jack does what it takes to earn back Sydneys trust, while Sydney and Vaughn may have been exposed to a deadly virus.
episodes.title: Salvation

episodes.synopsis: Sydney must make a deal with her nemesis, Mr. Sark, in order to find a cure for an ailing Vaughn.
episodes.title: The Counteragent

episodes.synopsis: The Bristow family goes undercover on a deadly mission and Mr. Sark joins forces with SD-6.
episodes.title: Passage: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: While continuing on their first family mission together, Sydney and Jack learn where Irinas loyalties lie.
episodes.title: Passage: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Oscar, Emmy, and Golden Globe Award-winning actress Faye Dunaway guest stars as Alliance counterintelligence head Ariana Kane, who is investigating the disappearance of Emily; and Marshall is sent on his first mission.
episodes.title: The Abduction

episodes.synopsis: Marshalls life is placed in mortal danger, and Ariana Kane has her sights set on Jack as the prime suspect in the disappearance of Sloanes wife.
episodes.title: A Higher Echelon

episodes.synopsis: Ariana Kane (Faye Dunaway) tracks Sydney in order to catch Jack, and Sydney and Vaughns covers may have been compromised after sharing a romantic dinner together in France.
episodes.title: The Getaway

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Jack scramble to get information on the new Director of SD-6, who is appointed when Sloane goes missing.
episodes.title: Phase One

episodes.synopsis: Ethan Hawke guest stars as CIA Agent Lennox, whose identity is called into question by Sydney, Vaughn and Jack after his deep cover mission is blown.
episodes.title: Double Agent

episodes.synopsis: Sydney thinks about leaving the Agency, and Sloane kidnaps a scientist to help him piece together the mysterious Rambaldi device.
episodes.title: A Free Agent

episodes.synopsis: Sloane discovers the powers of a mysterious Rambaldi device, and Sydnay senses that Francie is keeping secrets.
episodes.title: Firebomb

episodes.synopsis: Sydney begins to lose trust in Vaughn when she discovers that he is under investigation by the Agency.
episodes.title: A Dark Turn

episodes.synopsis: Sydney faces off with her mother, while Emily Sloane (Amy Irving) must decide whether to side with her husband or betray him.
episodes.title: Truth Takes Time

episodes.synopsis: Sydney defies her father in her attempt to rescue a kidnapped scientist, while Sloane, seeking revenge, becomes more dangerous than ever. Meanwhile, Francie manipulates an unsuspecting Will for his agency connections.
episodes.title: Endgame

episodes.synopsis: "The Agency acts to stop an apocalyptic event - prophesized by Rambaldi - and Vaughn questions Dixons state of mind.
episodes.title: Countdown

episodes.synopsis: Will is arrested for espionage, Sydney questions her mothers deception and Irina reveals her true motivation. Sydney begins to question Wills identity when hes arrested for espionage, under suspicion of being a double.
episodes.title: Second Double

episodes.synopsis: Will is arrested for espionage, Sydney questions her mothers deception and Irina reveals her true motivation. Sydney finally confronts her mother, who reveals her true motivation.
episodes.title: The Telling

episodes.synopsis: After waking up in Tokyo, Sydney tries to remember what has happened in the past two years, and discovers that Vaughn is married.
episodes.title: The Two

episodes.synopsis: Jack confronts Sloane, doubting his redemption and blaming him for Syd's disappearance.
episodes.title: Succession

episodes.synopsis: A fireball drops from the sky, devastating Moscow's Gorky Park.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: A team steals four vials of Ebola from a French epidemiology lab. Lauren and Sydney question Laszlo Bogdan, a team member who was infected and captured.
episodes.title: A Missing Link

episodes.synopsis: Sydney tells Jackto activate the transmitter that she put on Vaughn. Sydney breaks into Simon Walker's room only to find the bio-weapon gone and sold to Sark.
episodes.title: Repercussions

episodes.synopsis: Sloane tells Sydney that intel about The Covenant's next move is encoded in an image of the Vatican on a web site.
episodes.title: The Nemesis

episodes.synopsis: Sydney wakes from a nightmare in which she sees an angel-like figure, then pulls strange tubes from her mysterious scar. Shaken, she asks a CIA psychiatrist about the memory-retrieval procedure.
episodes.title: Prelude

episodes.synopsis: Now in Lindsey's custody, Sydney is imprisoned and tortured at Camp Williams, a secret NSC detention facility.
episodes.title: Breaking Point

episodes.synopsis: Hiding out in a warehouse, the team devises a plan to frame The Covenant for Sydney's extraction.
episodes.title: Conscious

episodes.synopsis: Sydney tells Jack about a dream involving Will. Jack advises her to contact Will, who is in the witness protection program.
episodes.title: Remnants

episodes.synopsis: Kendall tells Sydney the truth about her two missing years.
episodes.title: Full Disclosure

episodes.synopsis: In a North Korean jail, Sydney passionately kisses Vaughn before they are both led, in chains, to a firing line.
episodes.title: Crossings

episodes.synopsis: At the CIA, the team discusses info gleaned from Lisenker, a Covenant defector.
episodes.title: After Six

episodes.synopsis: Dixon presents the team with a new mission: The Shining Sword, a Filipino terrorist organization, has acquired a next-generation bomb called a plasma charge, which they're shipping to Europe.
episodes.title: Blowback

episodes.synopsis: Daniel Ryan, a freelance bomb maker whose bombs are impossible to defuse, destroys a bank in Belfast as a calling card to The Covenant.
episodes.title: Facade

episodes.synopsis: Senator Reed, Lauren's father, arrives to oversee Sark's interrogation. He tells Jack that they must learn the identity of Sark's partner in The Covenant.
episodes.title: Taken

episodes.synopsis: Vaughn and Sydney travel to Mexico City searching for the key to open the Rambaldi box.
episodes.title: The Frame

episodes.synopsis: Dixon explains to the team that a computer worm, originating in Berlin, has targeted hospitals, laboratories and universities. They believe it's a Covenant attack.
episodes.title: Unveiled

episodes.synopsis: Sark takes a manuscript regarding The Passenger, called The Restoration.
episodes.title: Hourglass

episodes.synopsis: Sloane reveals that he found a Rambaldi text that contained a formula for an elixir that would allow The Passenger to channel a message from Rambaldi.
episodes.title: Blood Ties

episodes.synopsis: Sloane takes the notes that an entranced Nadia has written and pins them to a board, where they form some kind of diagram.
episodes.title: Legacy

episodes.synopsis: When the mission to kill Vaughn's wife ends up putting Vaughn in the hospital, Sydney decides it's time to kill Lauren. Nadia is forced to decide whether she can trust her father.
episodes.title: Resurrection

episodes.synopsis: Sydney quits the CIA, and joins a Black Ops unit, "Authoried Personnel Only", along with Vaughn, Dixon, Jack, and Sloane.
episodes.title: Authorized Personnel Only: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: What Sydney found out in Wittenburg may endanger her relationship with Jack.
episodes.title: Authorized Personnel Only: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Sloane says Valta, a computer that will revolutionize info gathering, was stolen from the NSA headquarters by Martin Bishop, who will deliver it to a German terrorist group.
episodes.title: The Awful Truth

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Vaughn are sent on a mission by APO to obtain a sample of Ice 5, a weapon that can freeze a person to death.
episodes.title: Ice

episodes.synopsis: Posing as a Chechen couple, Sydney and Vaughn infiltrate a training camp run by the October Contingent.
episodes.title: Welcome To Liberty Village

episodes.synopsis: After being infected with a hallucinogen, Sydney starts to lose touch with reality.
episodes.title: Nocturne

episodes.synopsis: Nadia and Sydney go undercover as wealthy, irresponsible young heiresses to uncover the whereabouts of a deadly chemical.
episodes.title: Détente

episodes.synopsis: Sloane steps down as director of his task force and gives Jack full authority over the next assignment, which involves Anna Espinosa, Sydney's old foe.
episodes.title: Echoes

episodes.synopsis: While Nadia is in a coma, Sark is taken into APO to help them infiltrate Cadmus Revolutionary Front and retrieve the bomb.
episodes.title: A Man of His Word

episodes.synopsis: Dixon enlists Sydney to help him prove that Sloane is double-crossing the CIA and using APO to steel the Blackwell Index, a master blackmail list.
episodes.title: The Index

episodes.synopsis: Sydney must protect the life of a civilian she unintentionally put in danger.
episodes.title: The Road Home

episodes.synopsis: Nadia puts the one's she loves lives in danger when she forgets to tell them about her criminal past.
episodes.title: The Orphan

episodes.synopsis: Jack agrees to Sydney's request for clearance on files relating to Vaughn's father.
episodes.title: Tuesday

episodes.synopsis: Dixon is shot by a masked gunman. The shooter approaches and takes off his mask, revealing Vaughn.
episodes.title: Nightingale

episodes.synopsis: In Poland, men posing as airport guards abduct Professor Sinclair, a nuclear physicist. She wakes up bound in a dark room and is greeted by a man impersonating Arvin Sloane.
episodes.title: Pandora

episodes.synopsis: When a mission does not go well, Sydney is attacked and her life is placed in danger. The only one who can save Sydney is Marshall.
episodes.title: Another Mister Sloane

episodes.synopsis: The APO team watches footage of an explosion at the Indonesian embassy in Copenhagen that killed 15 people, the work of terrorists headed by Milos Kradic.
episodes.title: A Clean Conscience

episodes.synopsis: Sydney tells Vaughn that she hasn't seen her father in two days. They go to his apartment and find a notebook with recent records of Jack's vitals.
episodes.title: Mirage

episodes.synopsis: The Sloane imposter is questioned about the Rambaldi orchird, but first the real Sloane must remember a painful memory.
episodes.title: In Dreams..

episodes.synopsis: A tactical group infiltrates the DSR and steals the Rambaldi artifacts. Sophia says goodbye to Nadia and Sydney, telling them that the Lisbon police confirmed that it is safe.
episodes.title: The Descent

episodes.synopsis: A giant version of the Circumference/Mueller device is found floating over city in Russia, making the citizens insane. Sydney, Nadia, and Jack search for Irina.
episodes.title: Search and Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Jack, Sydney, Vaughn, and Irina parachute into Sovogda, trying to dismantle a giant red ball turning people into zombies.
episodes.title: Before the Flood

episodes.synopsis: After learning that the man she has known as Michael Vaughn is under investigation and suspected of being a double agent, Sydney begins to question whether their business and personal relationship over the years had all been a lie.
episodes.title: Prophet Five

episodes.synopsis: Sydney visits Sloane in his jail cell. Jack meets with Thomas Grace, a new agent he is recruiting for APO.
The team interrogates Rachel, a hacker working for Dean, as Sydney realizes they have a lot of similiarities.
episodes.title: The Shed

episodes.synopsis: A shipping crane lifts Sydney's car hundreds of feet off the ground. Sydney answers her phone - it's Gordon Dean saying he wants Mockingbird.
episodes.title: Mockingbird

episodes.synopsis: Sloane asks to be reinstated in APO so he can find a cure for Nadia. Syd and Tom meet Renee in Marseilles and return to her loft, where the now revived but disoriented man from the box surprises them.
episodes.title: Out of the Box

episodes.synopsis: Sydney must guide a nervous and pensive Rachel on her first solo mission. Sloane must decide whether or not to betray the trust he's recently earned with APO.
episodes.title: Solo

episodes.synopsis: Sloane confesses to Jack and Sydney that he had been working with Dean, as they come up with a plan to trap him.
episodes.title: Fait Accompli

episodes.synopsis: Unaware of who the other really is, Rachel and Sark fall for each other while both undercover.
episodes.title: Bob

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to gain information from her, Prophet 5 captures Sydney and makes her relive moments of her past with Vaughn.
episodes.title: The Horizon

episodes.synopsis: Marshall recovers an emergency transmission from Sydney but it's deleted by a Langley insider before he could listen to it - meaning Prophet 5 has infiltrated the CIA.
episodes.title: S.O.S

episodes.synopsis: Irina returns and claiming to want to help, convinces Jack and Sydney to take her on a mission to retrieve The Horizon.
episodes.title: Maternal Instinct

episodes.synopsis: As part of a plan to bring Sydney back into the field for Prophet 5's own purposes, Peyton has Anna Espinosa kidnap Will Tippen.
episodes.title: There's Only One Sydney Bristow

episodes.synopsis: Sloane is distressed to learn that Prophet Five's cure for Nadia is just as likely to kill her. Meanwhile, the search for Anna Espinosa continues, Rambaldi's prophetic Page 47 resurfaces, and Sydney offers Renie a job at APO.
episodes.title: 30 Seconds

episodes.synopsis: Sydney must beat arch-nemesis Anna Espinosa to the punch when a mysterious chip found implanted in Renée is tied to Vaughn. Meanwhile, Sloane struggles with ghostly visions while working for Prophet Five.
episodes.title: I See Dead People

episodes.synopsis: Sydney must stay undercover and partner with Sark to track down Rambaldi's final clue before Prophet Five finds it. Meanwhile, Vaughn sees daughter Isabelle for the first time, and Rachel discovers Tom's secret.
episodes.title: No Hard Feelings

episodes.synopsis: Sloane takes Marshall and Rachel hostage in order to discover a crucial clue to Rambaldi's ultimate endgame, as Sydney, Vaughn and APO race to stop him.
episodes.title: Reprisal

episodes.synopsis: Sydney and Jack must find a way to keep Sloane and Irina from putting their deadly plan into action.
episodes.title: All the Time in the World
